epfl.sweng.servercomm

Class SwengHttpClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.sweng.servercomm.SwengHttpClientFactory

  • public class SwengHttpClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The SwengHttpClientFactory class is an HTTP Client factory. The client is unique, it is returned by the getInstance() method.

    It also allows to inject custom HTTP Clients for testing purpose, by the method setInstance(AbstractHttpClient).

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static org.apache.http.impl.client.AbstractHttpClient getInstance()
        Returns the unique instance of the AbstractHttpClient. The instance will be created if it doesn't exist.
        Returns:
        The HTTP Client instance.

      • setInstance

        public static void setInstance(org.apache.http.impl.client.AbstractHttpClient instance)
        Sets a new value to the AbstractHttpClient. This has been implemented for testing purpose.
        Parameters:
        A - new HTTP Client instance.
